description:
The investment seeks to generate long-term capital appreciation.
 The fund is an actively managed exchange-traded fund that seeks to achieve its investment objective by primarily investing in the broad U.S. equity market. It invests in stocks with liquidity and fundamental characteristics that are historically associated with superior long-term performance. The fund invests at least 80% of its net assets (plus any borrowings for investment purposes) in equity securities with ongoing share repurchases.
